statements.statement: Grapes are poisonous to dogs.
Dogs are completely color blind.
There are 7 dog breed groups.
Huskies are from New Zealand.
The Great Dane is the largest dog in the world.
A dog's nose is as unique as a human's fingerprints.
Queen Elizabeth's favorite dog breed is the Labrador.
There are 3,000 dogs in the world.
Adult dogs have 42 teeth.
Dalmatians have spots inside their mouths.
Female dogs definitely have better personalities if they are allowed to have a litter before being spayed.
A pet store, selling dogs for profit, isn't the best place to buy a puppy.
The jaws of pit bulls are anatomically different from those of other dogs so that they can lock shut when they fight.
Purebred dogs are *always* less healthy than mutts.
The Chinese Crested and other hairless dogs have higher body temperatures than dogs with hair.
The poodle originated in France.
The dog was the first domesticated animal.
Mixed-breed dogs do not get hip dysplasia.
Some drug-detecting dogs are trained by addicting them to the drug that they are supposed to find.
If your dog makes a mess on the carpet, you should rub his nose in it to teach him not to go in the house.
Only male dogs raise a leg to urinate.
Puppies should not be taken from their mother until they are *at least* seven weeks old.
Dogs who are just household pets don't need obedience training.
The best way to get your dog trained is to have someone else do it.
In laboratory tests, dogs really are 'smarter' than cats.
